item.title: Echoes of Defiance
item.description: In the cavernous expanse of the corporate jungle, I tread lightly, an unwelcome intruder. Each step I take feels like tiptoeing through a minefield of expectations, where the slightest misstep could detonate the fragile facade of acceptance I’ve constructed. My voice, a symphony of unheard melodies, echoes through the sterile corridors, drowned out by the thunderous applause for those who fit the mold. They speak in tongues of authority, their language foreign to my ears, leaving me stranded on the outskirts of comprehension.

item.title: Tyranny of Language
item.description: In the lexicon of life, a grim tableau, Where words can wound, and spirits low. In every phrase, a dagger’s thrust, Power’s hand, in language’s rust. In boardroom meetings, where suits convene, Language dictates who reigns supreme. The one who speaks with confidence, bold, Controls the narrative, as stories unfold. On streets where whispers fade to naught, The silenced masses, battles fought. Their voices stifled, dreams suppressed, By language’s tyranny, they’re oppressed.

item.title: About us!
item.description: What did we set out to do? As a group, our aim was to delve into the intricate relationship between language and identity, exploring how the use of language can profoundly impact our internal sense of self. Through many brainstorming sessions, we arrived at the idea of creating an online blog/newsletter as our chosen medium. This platform offers us the freedom and flexibility to articulate our thoughts and emotions in diverse ways, allowing each of us to express ourselves authentically.
